c108f5d5f2a5.title: Thank you for pulling all these pieces together.

paragraphs.text: Thank you for pulling all these pieces together. Well done. I was deeply disturbed, seeing the news coverage of our Syrian bombing, at how the #MSM response was to practically wet themselves over the “beautiful” missiles and how “presidential” they now saw the man who took advice to commit an act of war — from his daughter.
paragraphs.name: 87ce

paragraphs.text: No, …Ivanka? Putin told trump what and where and when. Ivanka may have helped her father pivot on a dime, and came up with the “beautiful baby” idea. Trump gave the order and coordinates Putin gave him to the navy as Putin demanded, and trump watched from a Florida Banquet room. The keystone kop administration could not have pulled this off. If trump…
paragraphs.name: cbc3

d6de68e38544.title: This reminds me of the old adage we have all heard at some time in our lives, “If your friend…

paragraphs.text: This reminds me of the old adage we have all heard at some time in our lives, “If your friend jumped off a cliff would you do it too? Well just because Ivanka says it does that mean Donnie has to do it? Evidently it does. So now we know who is running the government, Jared and Ivanka. I say we recall them.
paragraphs.name: 6d5c

paragraphs.name: 5ca8

paragraphs.text: That is very sad. However, we hit a military base. We gave them warning we were going to do so. Why were children even there? They hit a residential area full of civilians. There is a huge difference between accidental collateral damage, and purposely targeting children. I don’t like Trump, but let’s use more logic than emotion, please.
